title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 110.4 - Times and places for inspecting records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 110.4 - Times and places for inspecting records

State Regulations

Fees for copies. The fee for paper copies of records shall be
twenty-five cents per page for paper copies not exceeding nine inches by
fourteen inches or the actual cost of reproducing any other type of record in
accordance with section
87
of the

Public Officers Law. Based on the circumstances of each request, the Department
may: (a) require payment prior to
processing a request, or
(b) require payment prior to releasing a completed request, or
(c) waive any applicable fees. Waivers of
fees will be granted on a case-by-case basis and will be decided based on the
circumstances surrounding each request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
110.4

Adopted

New

York State Register January 29, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 04, eff. 1/29/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
